wikipedia_page.main: Verity Beatrice Snook-Larby (born November 13, 1970) is a retired female race walker from Scotland, who also represented Great Britain during her career.  She trained at Aldershot, Farnham & District AC.

link_mentions.page: Aldershot, Farnham and District Athletic Club
response: The sprint section is led by various coaches and the race walking teams are run and trained by former Commonwealth Games athlete Verity Snook-Larby.
